bookText.htmlContent: Nagas can be found pretty much anywhere in Lilith's Realm. Nagas are usually easy to recognize due to them having long tails instead of legs and scales all over their bodies.

Nagas are quite one of the few races having long snake-like tails instead of legs. They also feature venomous fangs and a cowl on their heads, giving them this unique snake appearance.

Nagas are usually known to be quite powerful and rich, mostly living in the higher spheres of society. They tend to have exquisite tastes but to be quite naughty as well.

Nagas offsprings will be either female or futas and on some occasions male, their race bearing a more feminine appearance.
